command.program:
check_samplesheet.py \
        samplesheet_test.csv \
        samplesheet.valid.csv

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_METHYLSEQ:METHYLSEQ:INPUT_CHECK:SAMPLESHEET_CHECK":
        python: $(python --version | sed 's/Python //g')
    END_VERSIONS

bismark_genome_preparation \
        --bowtie2 \
        BismarkIndex

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_METHYLSEQ:METHYLSEQ:PREPARE_GENOME:BISMARK_GENOMEPREPARATION":
        bismark: $(echo $(bismark -v 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*Bismark Version: v//; s/Copyright.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

printf "%s\n" SRR389222_sub1.fastq.gz | while read f; do [[ $f =~ ^SRR389222_sub1.* ]] || ln -s $f SRR389222_sub1_$f ; done
    fastqc --quiet --threads 1 SRR389222_sub1*

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_METHYLSEQ:METHYLSEQ:FASTQC":
        fastqc: $( fastqc --version | sed -e "s/FastQC v//g" )
    END_VERSIONS

[ ! -f  SRR389222_sub1.fastq.gz ] && ln -s SRR389222_sub1.fastq.gz SRR389222_sub1.fastq.gz
        trim_galore \
            --fastqc \
            --cores 1 \
            --gzip \
            SRR389222_sub1.fastq.gz

        cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
        "NFCORE_METHYLSEQ:METHYLSEQ:TRIMGALORE":
            trimgalore: $(echo $(trim_galore --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*version //; s/Last.*$//')
            cutadapt: $(cutadapt --version)
        END_VERSIONS

printf "%s\n" Ecoli_10K_methylated_R1.fastq.gz Ecoli_10K_methylated_R2.fastq.gz | while read f; do [[ $f =~ ^Ecoli_10K_methylated.* ]] || ln -s $f Ecoli_10K_methylated_$f ; done
    fastqc --quiet --threads 1 Ecoli_10K_methylated*

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_METHYLSEQ:METHYLSEQ:FASTQC":
        fastqc: $( fastqc --version | sed -e "s/FastQC v//g" )
    END_VERSIONS

[ ! -f  Ecoli_10K_methylated_1.fastq.gz ] && ln -s Ecoli_10K_methylated_R1.fastq.gz Ecoli_10K_methylated_1.fastq.gz
        [ ! -f  Ecoli_10K_methylated_2.fastq.gz ] && ln -s Ecoli_10K_methylated_R2.fastq.gz Ecoli_10K_methylated_2.fastq.gz
        trim_galore \
            --fastqc \
            --cores 1 \
            --paired \
            --gzip \
            Ecoli_10K_methylated_1.fastq.gz \
            Ecoli_10K_methylated_2.fastq.gz

        cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
        "NFCORE_METHYLSEQ:METHYLSEQ:TRIMGALORE":
            trimgalore: $(echo $(trim_galore --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*version //; s/Last.*$//')
            cutadapt: $(cutadapt --version)
        END_VERSIONS

cat input1/SRR389222_sub2.fastq.gz input2/SRR389222_sub3.fastq.gz > SRR389222_sub2.merged.fastq.gz

            cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
            "NFCORE_METHYLSEQ:METHYLSEQ:CAT_FASTQ":
                cat: $(echo $(cat --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*coreutils) //; s/ .*$//')
            END_VERSIONS

bismark \
        SRR389222_sub1_trimmed.fq.gz \
        --genome BismarkIndex \
        --bam \
        --bowtie2

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_METHYLSEQ:METHYLSEQ:BISMARK:BISMARK_ALIGN":
        bismark: $(echo $(bismark -v 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*Bismark Version: v//; s/Copyright.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

bismark \
        -1 Ecoli_10K_methylated_1_val_1.fq.gz -2 Ecoli_10K_methylated_2_val_2.fq.gz \
        --genome BismarkIndex \
        --bam \
        --bowtie2

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_METHYLSEQ:METHYLSEQ:BISMARK:BISMARK_ALIGN":
        bismark: $(echo $(bismark -v 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*Bismark Version: v//; s/Copyright.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

printf "%s\n" SRR389222_sub2.merged.fastq.gz | while read f; do [[ $f =~ ^SRR389222_sub2.* ]] || ln -s $f SRR389222_sub2_$f ; done
    fastqc --quiet --threads 1 SRR389222_sub2*

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_METHYLSEQ:METHYLSEQ:FASTQC":
        fastqc: $( fastqc --version | sed -e "s/FastQC v//g" )
    END_VERSIONS

[ ! -f  SRR389222_sub2.fastq.gz ] && ln -s SRR389222_sub2.merged.fastq.gz SRR389222_sub2.fastq.gz
        trim_galore \
            --fastqc \
            --cores 1 \
            --gzip \
            SRR389222_sub2.fastq.gz

        cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
        "NFCORE_METHYLSEQ:METHYLSEQ:TRIMGALORE":
            trimgalore: $(echo $(trim_galore --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*version //; s/Last.*$//')
            cutadapt: $(cutadapt --version)
        END_VERSIONS

deduplicate_bismark \
         \
        -s \
        --bam SRR389222_sub1_trimmed_bismark_bt2.bam

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_METHYLSEQ:METHYLSEQ:BISMARK:BISMARK_DEDUPLICATE":
        bismark: $(echo $(bismark -v 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*Bismark Version: v//; s/Copyright.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

samtools sort  -@ 1 -o SRR389222_sub1.sorted.bam -T SRR389222_sub1.sorted SRR389222_sub1_trimmed_bismark_bt2.bam
    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_METHYLSEQ:METHYLSEQ:BISMARK:SAMTOOLS_SORT_ALIGNED":
        samtools: $(echo $(samtools --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*samtools //; s/Using.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

samtools sort  -@ 1 -o Ecoli_10K_methylated.sorted.bam -T Ecoli_10K_methylated.sorted Ecoli_10K_methylated_1_val_1_bismark_bt2_pe.bam
    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_METHYLSEQ:METHYLSEQ:BISMARK:SAMTOOLS_SORT_ALIGNED":
        samtools: $(echo $(samtools --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*samtools //; s/Using.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

deduplicate_bismark \
         \
        -p \
        --bam Ecoli_10K_methylated_1_val_1_bismark_bt2_pe.bam

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_METHYLSEQ:METHYLSEQ:BISMARK:BISMARK_DEDUPLICATE":
        bismark: $(echo $(bismark -v 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*Bismark Version: v//; s/Copyright.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

bismark \
        SRR389222_sub2_trimmed.fq.gz \
        --genome BismarkIndex \
        --bam \
        --bowtie2

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_METHYLSEQ:METHYLSEQ:BISMARK:BISMARK_ALIGN":
        bismark: $(echo $(bismark -v 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*Bismark Version: v//; s/Copyright.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

samtools sort  -@ 1 -o SRR389222_sub1.sorted.bam -T SRR389222_sub1.sorted SRR389222_sub1_trimmed_bismark_bt2.deduplicated.bam
    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_METHYLSEQ:METHYLSEQ:BISMARK:SAMTOOLS_SORT_DEDUPLICATED":
        samtools: $(echo $(samtools --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*samtools //; s/Using.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

bismark_methylation_extractor \
        SRR389222_sub1_trimmed_bismark_bt2.deduplicated.bam \
        --bedGraph \
        --counts \
        --gzip \
        --report \
        -s \
        

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_METHYLSEQ:METHYLSEQ:BISMARK:BISMARK_METHYLATIONEXTRACTOR":
        bismark: $(echo $(bismark -v 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*Bismark Version: v//; s/Copyright.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

preseq \
        lc_extrap \
         -verbose -bam \
         \
        -output SRR389222_sub1.lc_extrap.txt \
        SRR389222_sub1.sorted.bam
    cp .command.err SRR389222_sub1.command.log

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_METHYLSEQ:METHYLSEQ:PRESEQ_LCEXTRAP":
        preseq: $(echo $(preseq 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*Version: //; s/Usage:.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

preseq \
        lc_extrap \
         -verbose -bam \
        -pe \
        -output Ecoli_10K_methylated.lc_extrap.txt \
        Ecoli_10K_methylated.sorted.bam
    cp .command.err Ecoli_10K_methylated.command.log

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_METHYLSEQ:METHYLSEQ:PRESEQ_LCEXTRAP":
        preseq: $(echo $(preseq 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*Version: //; s/Usage:.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

samtools sort  -@ 1 -o Ecoli_10K_methylated.sorted.bam -T Ecoli_10K_methylated.sorted Ecoli_10K_methylated_1_val_1_bismark_bt2_pe.deduplicated.bam
    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_METHYLSEQ:METHYLSEQ:BISMARK:SAMTOOLS_SORT_DEDUPLICATED":
        samtools: $(echo $(samtools --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*samtools //; s/Using.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

bismark_methylation_extractor \
        Ecoli_10K_methylated_1_val_1_bismark_bt2_pe.deduplicated.bam \
        --bedGraph \
        --counts \
        --gzip \
        --report \
        -p \
        --no_overlap --ignore_r2 2 --ignore_r2 2

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_METHYLSEQ:METHYLSEQ:BISMARK:BISMARK_METHYLATIONEXTRACTOR":
        bismark: $(echo $(bismark -v 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*Bismark Version: v//; s/Copyright.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

samtools sort  -@ 1 -o SRR389222_sub2.sorted.bam -T SRR389222_sub2.sorted SRR389222_sub2_trimmed_bismark_bt2.bam
    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_METHYLSEQ:METHYLSEQ:BISMARK:SAMTOOLS_SORT_ALIGNED":
        samtools: $(echo $(samtools --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*samtools //; s/Using.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

deduplicate_bismark \
         \
        -s \
        --bam SRR389222_sub2_trimmed_bismark_bt2.bam

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_METHYLSEQ:METHYLSEQ:BISMARK:BISMARK_DEDUPLICATE":
        bismark: $(echo $(bismark -v 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*Bismark Version: v//; s/Copyright.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

unset DISPLAY
    mkdir tmp
    export _JAVA_OPTIONS=-Djava.io.tmpdir=./tmp
    qualimap \
        --java-mem-size=6G \
        bamqc \
         \
        -bam SRR389222_sub1.sorted.bam \
         \
        -p non-strand-specific \
         \
        -outdir SRR389222_sub1 \
        -nt 1

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_METHYLSEQ:METHYLSEQ:QUALIMAP_BAMQC":
        qualimap: $(echo $(qualimap 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*QualiMap v.//; s/Built.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

bismark2report 

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_METHYLSEQ:METHYLSEQ:BISMARK:BISMARK_REPORT":
        bismark: $(echo $(bismark -v 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*Bismark Version: v//; s/Copyright.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

unset DISPLAY
    mkdir tmp
    export _JAVA_OPTIONS=-Djava.io.tmpdir=./tmp
    qualimap \
        --java-mem-size=6G \
        bamqc \
         \
        -bam Ecoli_10K_methylated.sorted.bam \
         \
        -p non-strand-specific \
        --collect-overlap-pairs \
        -outdir Ecoli_10K_methylated \
        -nt 1

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_METHYLSEQ:METHYLSEQ:QUALIMAP_BAMQC":
        qualimap: $(echo $(qualimap 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*QualiMap v.//; s/Built.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

bismark2report 

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_METHYLSEQ:METHYLSEQ:BISMARK:BISMARK_REPORT":
        bismark: $(echo $(bismark -v 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*Bismark Version: v//; s/Copyright.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

preseq \
        lc_extrap \
         -verbose -bam \
         \
        -output SRR389222_sub2.lc_extrap.txt \
        SRR389222_sub2.sorted.bam
    cp .command.err SRR389222_sub2.command.log

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_METHYLSEQ:METHYLSEQ:PRESEQ_LCEXTRAP":
        preseq: $(echo $(preseq 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*Version: //; s/Usage:.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

samtools sort  -@ 1 -o SRR389222_sub2.sorted.bam -T SRR389222_sub2.sorted SRR389222_sub2_trimmed_bismark_bt2.deduplicated.bam
    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_METHYLSEQ:METHYLSEQ:BISMARK:SAMTOOLS_SORT_DEDUPLICATED":
        samtools: $(echo $(samtools --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*samtools //; s/Using.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

bismark_methylation_extractor \
        SRR389222_sub2_trimmed_bismark_bt2.deduplicated.bam \
        --bedGraph \
        --counts \
        --gzip \
        --report \
        -s \
        

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_METHYLSEQ:METHYLSEQ:BISMARK:BISMARK_METHYLATIONEXTRACTOR":
        bismark: $(echo $(bismark -v 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*Bismark Version: v//; s/Copyright.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

unset DISPLAY
    mkdir tmp
    export _JAVA_OPTIONS=-Djava.io.tmpdir=./tmp
    qualimap \
        --java-mem-size=6G \
        bamqc \
         \
        -bam SRR389222_sub2.sorted.bam \
         \
        -p non-strand-specific \
         \
        -outdir SRR389222_sub2 \
        -nt 1

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_METHYLSEQ:METHYLSEQ:QUALIMAP_BAMQC":
        qualimap: $(echo $(qualimap 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*QualiMap v.//; s/Built.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

bismark2report 

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_METHYLSEQ:METHYLSEQ:BISMARK:BISMARK_REPORT":
        bismark: $(echo $(bismark -v 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*Bismark Version: v//; s/Copyright.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

bismark2summary SRR389222_sub1_trimmed_bismark_bt2.bam Ecoli_10K_methylated_1_val_1_bismark_bt2_pe.bam SRR389222_sub2_trimmed_bismark_bt2.bam

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_METHYLSEQ:METHYLSEQ:BISMARK:BISMARK_SUMMARY":
        bismark: $(echo $(bismark -v 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*Bismark Version: v//; s/Copyright.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

def args = task.ext.args ?: ''
template 'dumpsoftwareversions.py'

multiqc \
        --force \
         \
        --config multiqc_config.yml \
         \
        .

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_METHYLSEQ:METHYLSEQ:MULTIQC":
        multiqc: $( multiqc --version | sed -e "s/multiqc, version //g" )
    END_VERSIONS
